content.rendered:
Millions of people have improved their leadership and management style as well as the quality of their life after reading Ken Blanchard’s best-selling books. Now, in Smart Leadership, Blanchard reveals powerful life and leadership principles with simple insights that help you sharpen your leadership skills and build personal integrity.

This book contains smart leadership advice on aiming for excellence; maintaining integrity; finding courage to change; helping others reach their potential and much more.

Impact the lives of those around you by becoming a person of influence. Let one of the most revered leadership and management experts in the world show you how!

This book contains smart leadership advice […]
